DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect MK0859 lipoprotein metabolism patient dyslipidemia already statin therapy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect MK0859 Lipoprotein Metabolism Patients With Dyslipidemia ( 0859-026 AM3 )
DOC.criteria: Patient 's weight stable least 6 week Patient good health base medical history , physical exam , laboratory test Patient dyslipidemia Exclusion Criteria : Patient history stroke , seizure , major neurological disorder Patient history cancer Patient currently take lipidlowering medication substance except statin Patient consumes excessive amount alcohol caffeine Patient multiple and/or severe allergy food drug
